ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 21 Mar 2000, Kevin L. Crawford wrote:
> >
> > Charm animal useless? Talk to the druids in Sol B that charm sonic bats
> > all night long.....
> > Also the expansion is going to have high level outdoor zones. I am sure
> > there will be some 50+ animals to play with.
>
> That's 1 dungeon. Sure there will be other zones. But I'd rather not give
> Verant the idea to give us _just_ charm animal. We _deserve_ an upgrade to
> our current _unrestricted_ charm. Why accept something less? If you think

I suspect Verant is unhappy with the way charm worked out
(their own damn fault - every time they tweak mobs to make
them more powerful than players, it makes charm, and pets,
more powerful). So as a class that is a mediocre tank and can
"cast" while on the move, I doubt they'll give us a straight
upgrade to charm.

The problem they'll have is there isn't much room between
charm and mez for some method of mob control. If they give us
a mez that works, it'll basically be admission that they're
not going to fix the mez we already have.

--
